trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Pinetop-Lakeside
There were no other sightings in Pinetop-Lakeside on or around April 14th 2010
divs: sighting detailsi look at the sky a lot. i have seen a lot of ufo's, never very up close always at a distance. i mainly see them during the hours of 7:30 pm to 9 pm, or early in the morning at 4:30 am to about 5:45 am. thats when i see a lot of them. i have no recordings or video, because i dont have access to this kind of equipment. on this particular incident, my mother and i were outside talking and she saw it first, and said "what is that" i looked up and saw it slowly moving across the sky behind one of the pine trees in our back yard. it was far away but appeared to be very large and quite far away. perhaps farther than an airplane. it would take about the size of a dime to cover it up if i held it up in the air in front of the sphere. there was no sound, no flashing lights, no blinking of any kind. just one solid, bright golden\orange color, almost the color of flame. we stood there and just watched it slowly and silently move across the sky until it moved downward and behind my house where we couldnt see it anymore. we saw it in the western sky, and it moved north, and then eventually was in the eastern sky and went downward behind our house, it never got close up. but we both knew it was not a plane, not a flare, not a helicopter, definetely not a blimp or a weather baloon, and it wasnt a satellite either. whenever i see ufo's i havent ever seen crazy looking ones with lots of colors or anything like that. they are always far away, and they look similiar. sometimes they are more white-blue in color, or sometimes they may sporadically flash, not like an airplane does not at all. i plan to get equipment so i can capture footage. i am very confident that i can. i have seen hundreds of these things.
Summary: color:Goldish/Orange, almost the color of fire. sphere shaped, moved slowly across sky, no flashing, no sound, solid color
